b'Matsue Kankou Taishi Sanri ga Iku! Mat: b"An accompaniment to Heisei Matsue Kaidan: Ayashi. This ghost tour takes a more realistic approach featuring Yoshia (the fictional Eagle Talon character), Kihara Hirokatsu (horror and mystery novelist), Chafurin (voice actor and Shimae Prefecture ambassador), and Frogman (Ryou Ono's caricature; real-life director of the anime studio DLE). The quartet travels around Matsue City exploring horror/haunted real life locations talking about the history and how it became a paranormal focus.\n\nThe end of the episode promotes ticket sale and times for a real ghost tour watchers can partake in."

[b'Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Gaiden: Mukashi no Yoshida-kun', b'Yoshida no Matsue Beauty Daisakusen', b'Yoshida no Matsue Beauty Daisakusen Prologue', b'Yoshida no Time Slip Fumai-kou', b'3-bu de Wakaru Koizumi Yakumo no Kaidan', b'Heisei Matsue Kaidan: Ayashi']
